explains: adj. 闪闪发光的；辉煌的，显赫的；盛大的，华丽的
v. 闪闪发光；闪现（某种强烈情感）（glitter 的现在分词）

sentences.en: His glittering career was cut short by a heart attack.
sentences.cn: 他辉煌的事业被一次心脏病发作给提早完结了。

sentences.en: The tide was going out, and the sand was smooth and glittering.
sentences.cn: 潮水正在退去，沙滩平坦，闪闪发亮。

sentences.en: "Fame, fame, that glittering bauble, it is mine," he cried.
sentences.cn: “名声，名声，那个闪闪发光的小玩意儿，是我的。”他叫道。
